parameters:
Mouse Komachi is a hero to those who make thievery their
family business. Only targeting the rich is pretty stylish.
I'd like to meet them just once.

I got caught pickpocketing. And to think the wallet I stole
only had 10 mon in it... Geez, I really botched that one.

Ugh... I want to get out of this cell quickly... Staying in
such an unsanitary place is going to shorten my lifespan...

Hmm? Is that the girl who was exiled to Mujou Island
before...? No, perhaps it's just my imagination...

Eek! My apologies, Kiyoma-sama! I will keep the cell clean
from now on, so please forgive me!

...Hey there. Have you greeted the other prisoners? What did
you do to get caught?

You're quite the beauty, aren't you? Was it a scandalous
affair with a man? Or perhaps you're a courtesan who ran
away from the brothel leaving debts behind?

I'm the warden of this prison. Once you step in here, I'm
the lord, and my orders are absolute. I've heard about it,
you know? Banished to a distant island, right?

Heh heh heh! Such a cute girl in a place like this! Mind if
I mess with her a bit, Mr. Warden?

Wait. It depends on this girl's answer. Now, answer me. If
you show a defiant attitude, you'll suffer.

Being banished to an island is a punishment reserved for
serious crimes. You must have done something quite severe in
the secular world, huh? What crime did you commit? Tell me
honestly.

\c[27]Main performance count +10, vaginal ejaculation +5, external
ejaculation +5, fellatio +5, oral ejaculation +5, lewdness
level +5\c[0]
...Actually, I am... a thief known as Mouse Komachi...
What! You're that infamous Mouse Komachi!?

--Seriously! That's amazing! Are you really the person
herself!?

Yes, I am. I was caught recently and brought to this
prison...

Heh, well, I'm surprised. Even in prison, we've heard tales
of the noble thief Mouse Komachi. Stealing from the rich
and giving to the poor, that's quite honorable. I respect
that.
Would it be alright if I call you "Sister Komachi"?
Sister!? Me!? That's... a bit much...!

No, I really do respect you! Unlike a petty thief like me,
stealing thousands of ryō is truly admirable, seriously!

Your father, who was active five years ago, "Mouse Kozō,"
was also an admirable person. To someone like me, a petty
thief, he seemed like someone from another world...

No, I haven't met him, but he was a great thief who stirred
up all of Edo. Other thieves respected him greatly. You're
the daughter of Mouse Kozō and you don't know where your
father is?

...Yes, that's right. He suddenly disappeared from home... I
don't know where my father is either... where he is now or
what he's doing...

Is that so. Well, if he's alive, maybe you'll meet him again
someday. Even if you're banished to an island, don't give up
hope and keep trying.

You guys can't let Sister Komachi sleep on the cold ground.
Prepare a proper bed for her.

Yes sir, Mr. Warden! Mouse Komachi-san, we will prepare the
best futon in this prison for you! This way please!

Ahahaha... (It seems like everyone is looking at me with
respect. It's nice but also a bit troubling... such complex
feelings...)

--Karin was welcomed by the other prisoners and spent her
days in prison until the day she was banished to the island.
(I need to pee, but... everyone can see me here...)

Heh heh. That's the only toilet there is. Don't hold back,
do it♪ Holding it in is bad for your health, right? Or would
you rather wet yourself?

(...Can't help it. I'm going to leak if I keep holding it
in...)

--Karin steeled her resolve, lifted the hem of her kimono,
and straddled the toilet.

Heh heh heh! The sight of a young girl peeing is so
exciting...\I[15]
Spread your legs wider and show us more! Right?\I[15]

(...So embarrassing... How long do I have to stay in this
prison...)

With her face blushing from shame, Karin--watched by the
smirking prisoners--finished her business.

You botched a marriage scam, huh... Denma-cho prison is
where all the criminals caught in Edo end up. What crime did
you commit?

I used to be a thief. Got caught by the shogunate's
officials, and now I'm in this mess. Can't do anything bad
anymore...

A new girl, huh? Heh, pretty cute! You better not cross the
boss sitting on the tatami in the center. He's a man who
boasts about winning a brawl against 20 men barehanded at
the gambling den.

Heh, this is a man's room, you know? Don't complain no
matter what happens, missy\I[15]

Hey, newbie. Make sure to greet the senior prisoners around
you. And lastly, greet the cell boss-sama. Got it?
Wake up. The ship is ready. We're heading to Mujou Island.
Mujou Island...? Where exactly is that island?

It's a southern island far beyond Izu. A solitary island
from which you can never escape. Now, follow me.
--Karin was taken out of the cell.
Come on, get on the ship. It's useless to struggle.
...(So this is the last I'll see of Edo...)
--Karin was bound with rope and put on the ship.

This is terrible...! What's going on with the jail's
sanitation management?!

I-I'm sorry, Kyuuma-sama! But, considering they're all
heinous criminals, I thought we didn't need to worry too
much about the cleanliness inside the cells...

Even if they have committed crimes, it's unacceptable to
have them in a filthy jail reeking of foul odors. What if an
epidemic were to break out from the jail and spread
throughout Edo? Make sure to improve the cleaning and
thoroughly enforce sanitation management. Understood,
jailkeeper?
Yes! Ha ha--! I will rectify it immediately!

What's this, Karin? Have you come to enter the jail again on
your own accord? How commendable.

No, that's not it! I was just curious about the state of the
jail after that incident, so I happened to stop by!

Ha ha, just kidding. The officials of this jailhouse have
been slacking off. I'm giving them a strict talking-to right
now.

Despite the construction, it's unthinkable to put men and
women together in the same cell. You agree, don't you?
I agree. I was shocked when I was imprisoned in this jail.

--Eh?! You're the girl who was previously locked up here?
Weren't you supposed to be exiled to Mujou Island?...!?

This girl has been pardoned and is now free of all charges.
Karin, how does it feel to go from a thief to a secret agent
of the shogunate? Are you living fulfilling days?

Well... I accepted the job in exchange for my pardon... so I
guess I'll do my best from here on out--

Hmm. That spirit is truly admirable. As a kunoichi, I want
you to fulfill your duties for the public office. I'm
counting on you to protect Edo, Mouse Komachi. No, I mean
Kunoichi Karin.

You probably have no more business here, right? Please
devote yourself to your mission. Take care.
